title: The Earnings Crunch Is Getting Real
itunes:title: The Earnings Crunch Is Getting Real
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, discusses the details President Biden’s vaccine plan. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Mark Gurman explains why Apple’s app store was dealt a blow in the Epic antitrust case. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Brooke Sutherland break down how shortages and rising costs have reached a tipping point for manufacturers and are set to take a bigger bite out of third-quarter results. Denelle Dixon, CEO of the Stellar Development Foundation, talks about the impact of the infrastructure bill on the blockchain industry. And we Drive to the Close with Ryan Detrick, Senior Market Strategist at LPL Financial.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Katie Greifeld. Producers: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
